argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A e. RR+ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rpssre | |- RR+ C_ RR |
| 6 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sstri | |- RR+ C_ CC |
| 8 |  | #P_rpmulcl | |- ( ( x e. RR+ /\ y e. RR+ ) -> ( x x. y ) e. RR+ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_1rp | |- 1 e. RR+ |
| 10 |  | #P_rpreccl | |- ( x e. RR+ -> ( 1 / x ) e. RR+ ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( x e. RR+ /\ x =/= 0 ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. RR+ ) |
| 12 | 7, 8, 9, 11 | #P_expcl2lem | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ A =/= 0 /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A ^ N ) e. RR+ ) |
| 13 | 1, 3, 4, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A ^ N ) e. RR+ ) |
